storyInfo: After coming across Xiaobai and Ah Gen, Xiaohei finds they're not the only ones reuniting.

attributes.text: Morning twilight—a goodbye from the dark night to the light of day.
Evening twilight—a reunion between the light of day and the dark night.

They bid farewell, only to cross again, and so too the sun and moon alternate, and time passes, and all life begins to spread, and history stutters ever onward, and civilization comes to endure, and all this in its entirety starts from no more than a meeting and a parting.

attributes.name: Xiaobai
attributes.content: Xiaohei...?

attributes.name: Xiaobai
attributes.content: Xiaohei!
Xiaobai!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Is it really you?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Yep! It's me!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I thought I'd never see you again...
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: We've been looking for you all this time.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Same here! Are you guys alright?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Pats Xiaohei on the shoulder) Good as ever. Don't worry.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: What about you, Xiaohei? Are you hurt? Have you been going hungry?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: (Shakes head) No, I'm doing great! I've been eating good every day!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Haha, that's so great to hear!
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: I just never expected we'd reunite in a place like this.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Who cares? We did!
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Mm-hm!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: So you're working part-time for Mr. Lee now?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Yeah. He took me in, and I felt bad just freeloading there.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: What about you guys? How have you been doing at that Rhodes Island place?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: We haven't actually been to the landship yet. We're just here with their operators in the branch office for now.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: And what's their branch office like?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: A lot like the Hall for Spirits—their main thing is helping out some very unique people.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: You might have seen them. The ones with rocks growing on them.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Ah. I know how... tough their lives are. Other people treat them so badly.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Yeah. It's why I admire Rhodes Island's operators.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: I've been so worried about you guys coming here and catching it. Isn't it dangerous for you to stay there?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: They have thorough protective measures at the branch office. And as for Xiaobai, I've been taking good care of her.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Don't worry, plenty of operators work there, and they don't get sick.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Like Rockrock!
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: She's been helping these sick people for forever, and she's always been fine.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: (Glances at Rockrock)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Rockrock, that little Feline's looking at you.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: He is?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: (Waves an arm at Xiaohei)
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: (Stiffens up) Agh!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Relax, they're good people.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: You must be Xiaohei. Xiaobai and Ah Gen told me about you.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: And you're just as adorable as I imagined.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: N-Nice to meet you, Rockrock.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Xiaohei, Xiaoyuan has a few things she'd like to tell you.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Come on, don't be shy now.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Um, hello...
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: (Smile, Xiaohei! Xiaoyuan's really nervous to see you.)
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Oh, okay.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Uh, hello, Xiaoyuan? What did you want to tell me...?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Um, thanks... thanks for helping me find Sixty-Seven.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: No problem. If I weren't helping him, I wouldn't have found my friends either.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: So you're all friends too! Today's such a great day. Everyone's finding everyone they missed.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Isn't that right, Sixty-Seven?
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: (Licks foot)
attributes.name: Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: Wrraaw...
attributes.name: Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: You named him Sixty-Seven?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Mm-hm, because he was sitting on sixty-seven LMD in a suitcase when we found him.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Did his original owner abandon him there?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Yeah. And that's not even enough for a bag of pet food.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: (Lies down) Mreeh...
attributes.name: Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: Sixty-Seven... I think heard that name somewhere recently...
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: If memory serves, they had Oripathy. By the looks of it, they were on their last legs... Then they asked me to keep the little guy too.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Come to think of it, I still remember them turning out their pockets to find every last bit of change...
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: ...I even remember how much they managed to scrape together...
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Sixty-seven. Sixty-seven LMD exact.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Xiaoyuan... did you ever go see a really strange-talking, but really good doctor?!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Did you ask him to take in this cloudbeast because you'd gotten sick?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: No! Why would I do that?
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: He's my pet! Why would I give him to someone else?!
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: And anyway, there are all these really amazing doctors here! I'm not gonna go ask anyone else for help!
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Well, if you're not the one...
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Wait, then who was that?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Stares at the storm cloudbeast)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Who else could be the one you're looking for?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Droops its head)
attributes.name: Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: Sixty-Seven... do you still miss somebody?
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Mrew...
attributes.name: Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: Er, who are you lot talking about? Me and Suzuran are a little lost here.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Who is this 'somebody'?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.text: Everyone looks around at each other with all manner of expression: furrowing brows and pinching noses, foreheads broadcasting their confusion, brains swimming through disarray. Everyone is repeating a single question in their minds:
Photo after photo stuck to the barbed wire seems to come to life, their clamorous noise drowning out the conversation as they fly every which way between its participants.
Face after face comes unstuck from the paper as they start to circle around Xiaobai, forming a storm.
In its center, faces of joy, pain, grief, resignation, tears, smiles, youth, age... all sorts of faces relentlessly flit past her gaze, faster and faster.
And thus she closes her eyes.
Is it you? She silently asks in her heart.
The photos all come to a halt in the air, the storm gone without a sound.
When she opens her eyes again, what greets them is another pair of eyes, soft and warm, creased in a smile as they gaze towards her.
Eyes belonging to an unfamiliar man, holding a familiar cloudbeast in his embrace.

attributes.content: Ah...
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: What is it, Xiaobai?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: I think I know who he's looking for.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: I saw a photo here. The cloudbeast in it looked exactly the same as Sixty-Seven.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: When did you see it?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Just today. I was trying to find Suzuran, so I could ask her to hold a funeral for Sixty-Seven.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Funeral? But he's right here, isn't he?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Haha, it's complicated. We were helping Xiaoyuan look for him too, but in the end all we found was a collar with blood on it.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: So we were going to hold a funeral because we thought he'd already passed away. We wanted to send him off properly.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Oh, I see. He was probably just hurt at that time.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Picks up the storm cloudbeast)
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Sixty-Seven, where did you get all these new cuts... wasn't the scar on your leg big enough?
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: (Licks Xiaoyuan's cheek)
attributes.name: Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: (Removes photograph from the wire)
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: This photo's been hanging here for years. It's a good thing it was underneath all those other pictures, so it hasn't faded too much.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Let me have a look... That's Sixty-Seven, no doubt about it. Xiaoyuan, here.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: (Takes photograph)
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Is this... the person you were looking for, Sixty-Seven?
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Is that why you could never sit still, and were always looking out the window and running away?
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Is it all because you were looking for him?
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: (Nuzzles photograph with forehead)
attributes.name: Storm Cloudbeast

attributes.content: The weird doctor said there was someone with stone disease who took out all the money they had, and begged him to take care of their pet cloudbeast.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: He was the one who told me to look here...
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: So when he was talking about what people had left behind, he meant these photos?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: So who put this photo up?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: And who'd come to visit it?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Perhaps—they're already among the other photos, somewhere along here.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Xiaoyuan, was there anything else left in the suitcase, apart from the money?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: No, nothing. If you're right, then that was probably everything he left behind.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Not everything. Didn't he leave you Sixty-Seven too?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: That's not really leaving him to me...
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Hey, look at the back of this photo, Xiaoyuan.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: (Turns photograph over)
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: It's a poem...
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: What does it say?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: It says...
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Says...
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.text: ...May Heaven protect you. There will be someone out there, to love you as I did.

attributes.content: (Tugs on Ah Gen's sleeve) Ah Gen...
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: (Kisses the storm cloudbeast's forehead)
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Sixty-Seven... did you know?
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: You weren't abandoned. You were the... best, best present ever, from the most generous person in Terra.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: From the storm cloudbeast's throat rolls a gentle rumble, like a sigh, and like a call too.
It turns its head, and gently brushes against the photograph.
Nightfall's embers fall on its face, like a hand reaching out from the past to brush away the fog of time, sweep off the dust of what light remains, and softly touch its forehead.
It soothes all its accumulated worries, and wipes away all its lingering doubts.
Sixty-Seven still misses his old owner so much.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Even though he's already gone.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: He might be, but he'll live forever in Sixty-Seven's memories.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Ah Gen, Xiaohei, will I always live in your memories too?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Haha, what are you talking about? It's still too soon to be asking that sort of thing.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Yeah, but... you'll live forever, and so will Xiaohei...
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Xiaohei?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: If you go somewhere really far away one day, you have to give me a proper goodbye, okay?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Mm-hm!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: We have to eat our favorite snacks together one more time!
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Mm-hm!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: We have to read a really good comic together one more time!
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Sounds good.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: And we have to hug one more time.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Sounds good.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Um... and... what else was there...?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: We're together now. That's more important than anything.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: (Pulls Ah Gen and Xiaohei's hands in)
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Mm-hm!
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Mm-hm.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: It was a gloaming, it was a dayspring. It was deepest night, it was brightest noon.
The day's sunlight was brilliant, the day's rainclouds stretched forever. The clouds hung thick in the sky, the clouds hung as wisps in the sky.
My departing footsteps placed ever so lightly, so I would not rouse you.
I abandoned you, and you parted with me.
Unwilling, and unresigned.
Fate is a merciful one.
With a single finger, it turns time's needle back.
Click, pitter-patter.
Back the raindrops hid in the clouds, back the writing drew into the pen, back the leaves grew onto the trees, the forget-me-nots returning to their buds once more.
And little by little, I came back to your side.
My arriving footsteps placed every so lightly, without the heart to rouse you.
That day, I embraced you, and you met me.
Xiaoyuan, the car's outside! Hurry up!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: I'm coming, I'm coming! Wait for me!
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Got everything with you?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Yeah! It's all in my suitcase.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: How about you, Sixty-Seven? You got everything of yours?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Mrrreah!
attributes.name: Sixty-Seven

attributes.content: Then I think we're off!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Miss Rockrock, wait for us! We're going to Rhodes Island too!
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Xiaobai?!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Xiaobai, don't run so fast!
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Ah Gen! Weren't you lot going to stay in Lungmen?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Um, Mr. Lee gave Xiaohei a mission to send some things over to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: What things?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: He told me it was confidential. All he said was to hand it to someone called the Doctor.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Doctor... That's such a funny name.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Haha, it's not a name. It's just a title.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Do you know who it is?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I do. Happens to be Rhodes Island's commander and one of its founders. Every operator I've ever met has nothing but respect.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Oh, I get it. It's your boss. You all listen to what they say.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Haha! Not that simple, hardly.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Then what kind of person is the Doctor, exactly?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Someone you'll all take a shine to, I know that. The instant you meet, you'll know.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Rockrock, are you and Xiaoyuan ready to go yet? The driver's getting impatient.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Xiaobai and the lot want to come with us too!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: That's right!
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: ...I was just thinking, what if I was so sad to leave you all that I started crying? This is perfect! We can all travel together now.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Xiaoyuan, you good to go?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Mm-hm, and so's Sixty-Seven.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Mraow!
attributes.name: Sixty-Seven

attributes.content: Then we're off.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Wait, Xiaobai—you left a bag!
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: I'll take it.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Oh, thanks. Alright, that's everything. Let's go.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: (Looks around)
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Time... flies so fast.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Yangni, is that the L.G.D.'s feed you're eating? You look like you love it. Is it that good?
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Wrwwrr!
attributes.name: Yangni

attributes.content: Why don't I give it a try?
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Wrr?
attributes.name: Yangni

attributes.content: Phleugh! Pteh, pteh. Guess that's a taste humans can't appreciate, after all.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Wraaw...
attributes.name: Yangni

attributes.content: Steamed buns for me, then.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: So what brings you back here?
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: You think I'd be here with you if I wasn't bringing Yangni his food?
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: You think I'd want you here if you weren't bringing Yangni his food?
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: (Narrows eyes at the owner)
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: Yangni, I bought you some new food and toys. How's that? Want to come live at the L.G.D. for a few days?
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: Awrruf!
attributes.name: Yangni

attributes.content: Evil on legs, you.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: (Angrily tears giant bite of steamed bun)
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Here. Take this.
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: What... vegetables and eggs? Where'd you find the kindness in your heart to give me this stuff?
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Heh, you just said it. I'm kind.
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: Hah... thanks.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Aw, Xiaohei and the cloudbeast are gone. I miss them.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: So do I. And I'm worried the food I gave him won't last the whole trip.
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: You filled an entire bag...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: He's at that Feline growth spurt age, after all. He needs to eat a ton.
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: Eh, that's fair.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Hey, Hung. Let's get a pet too.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Oh? What do you want?
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: A cloudbeast?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Oooh, hmmm... That could work. Let's ask Aak once he's out.
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: What's happening?!
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* What's this smell? People aren't meant to breathe this.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* Aak, what in the six syllables are you concocting?
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: Uh, slight mistake in the lab.
attributes.name: Aak

attributes.content: Slight?
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: Haha, you got it, aaand I'm out bye.
attributes.name: Aak

attributes.content: Actually... let's not get a pet.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Yeah. You're right. Let's not.
attributes.name: Hung

attributes.content: Listen up, mini-man, this vinyl's the work to end all works. The alpha and omega of opuses.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: And its creator? The one who stands before you! Me!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: *Chirp*!
attributes.name: Musbeast

attributes.content: Now that's what I like to hear. Somethin' tells me you're dyin' to get to it.
attributes.name: Emperor
Emperor
attributes.content: Music—

attributes.name: Emperor
attributes.content: Start!
*Chirp*!
attributes.name: Musbeast

attributes.content: ♪ Every glass at the bar sliding up to my lips ♪
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: *Chirp*!
attributes.name: Musbeast

attributes.content: ♪ I got notes in the bank, makin digits flip ♪
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: *Chirp*!
attributes.name: Musbeast

attributes.content: ♪ Hustlas runnin on past me goin one by one ♪
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: *Chirp*!
attributes.name: Musbeast

attributes.content: ♪ Be all stranger's faces to me under the sun ♪
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: *Chirp*!
attributes.name: Musbeast

attributes.content: ♪ They brushin shoulders with me, crowds on me, calendar days ♪
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: *Chirp*!
attributes.name: Musbeast

attributes.content: ♪ But I just wanna open my eyes and see you face to face ♪
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: *Chirp*!
attributes.name: Musbeast

attributes.content: ♪ Diamonds bling bling, gold bars bling bling ♪
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: *Chirp*!
attributes.name: Musbeast

attributes.content: ♪ But when I see the dazzle in you, they just ain't no thing ♪
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: *Chirp*!
attributes.name: Musbeast
